title: Five factors that will chart market direction during the coming holiday-truncated week

intro: China has relied on mindless monetary stimulus since 2008 to muscle its way to continued output production. China’s GDP growth has, thus, slowed dramatically.

intro: The market danced at the prospect of a halving of the US corporate tax rate. Goldman estimates that this alone could double S&P 500 earnings growth next year.

title: After Trump win, critic Warren Buffett sees strong stocks, trade hurdles
